short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create, share and track your processes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hi there, thank you for your interest in the Beezop Chrome Extension.

Beezop is a process management and SOP software. What this means is that we make it easy to manage all your business processes and Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs).

We built Beezop to help you train and onboard your team faster, delegate with confidence, and reduce errors.

With Beezop, all your processes and procedures are in one easy platform.

Through out Chrome Extension, you can access all your processes right from your browser without logging into the dashboard each time.
